We woke to sunny skies and rode to Stockholm. Bike paths the entire way. We dropped our bags off at the Red Boat hotel and then walked Gamla Stan, seeing the Nobel Prize museum, royal palace, which has the most rooms out of any royal residence in Europe, parliament, etc.
